answers.answer: If it keeps occurring you should contact your OB. It could be serious its also a sign of preeclampsia... I know it sounds bad but its better to be safe than sorry. I hope you feel better.
Really? :( okay ill definitely tell my doc. I have my nxt appt in 2 weeks for glucose testing. I havent had any blood pressure issues yet so i hope its not preeclampsia. Thank you

I show signs of preeclampsia but have not been diagnosed. You could just be having a spell for now that can happen if you get up to fast. But best wishes to you. Dont worry our bodies do crazy things while pregnant.

question: Im just sitting here and the room is spinning. What could the cause be. Im 27 weeks. 3rd child never experienced this. Tia
title: Dizzy spell while sitting?
